thread.title: Terrible!!!
thread.title_full: Terrible!!! - Review of Ibis Styles Paris Lafayette Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: I307TFannak
title: Terrible!!!
text: I always stay at accorhotels. I have silver card. Always before this case was everything ok. But now it was awful!!! I had pre-paid reservation for two rooms! For two rooms!!! Because i can't sleep with my parents in one room. But... They located me and my parents at one terrible small room. And didn't return money for second room!!! This is unacceptable! Holiday in Paris was spoiled!!!
